description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, including role-based UI components, navigation, and responsive layout features. It handles admin, manager, and delivery roles, rendering corresponding UI sections and navigation elements.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the home screen, managing role selection and presenting role-specific content.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, handling UI state, role toggling, and navigation logic.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A small widget displaying a labeled checklist item with an icon.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: Widget showing the current role in the app's navigation drawer header.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header section of the home screen with role title and pill selector.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Generates a responsive grid or column of role-specific management options.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Creates a dropdown widget for role selection.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Creates tappable pills for toggling roles.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns the header title string based on the selected role.
